abstract: United States Golf Assn and Royal and Ancient Golf Club, golf's two foremost ruling bodies, release their first joint code on amateur status; permit amateurs 18 and older to enter into contracts with agents or sponsors regarding their future as professionals, as long as they do not enjoy financial gain as amateurs.
snippet: Amateurs 18 and older will be permitted to enter into deal with agents or sponsors regarding their future — as long as they do not enjoy financial gain as amateurs.
lead_paragraph: Amateurs 18 and older will be permitted to enter into deal with agents or sponsors regarding their future — as long as they do not enjoy financial gain as amateurs.

headline.main: Changes to Rules Help Ease Pressure on Amateurs
headline.print_headline: Changes to Rules Help Ease Pressure on Amateurs
headline.seo: Changes to Golf’s Amateur Rules Help Ease Financial Pressure
